scripts.start-api: node -e "if (process.platform === 'win32') { process.exitCode = require('child_process').spawnSync('bash', ['-c', 'cd server && source venv/Scripts/activate && flask run --host=0.0.0.0 --port=3000 --no-debugger'], { stdio: 'inherit' }).status } else { process.exitCode = require('child_process').spawnSync('sh', ['-c', 'cd server && . venv/bin/activate && flask run --host=0.0.0.0 --port=5000 --no-debugger'], { stdio: 'inherit' }).status }"
